mapper.sql: F_ID, F_NAME, F_SPECIFICATION, F_ADDRESS, F_BATCH_NUMBER, F_EXPIRY_DATE, F_NUMBER, F_NUMBER_BAK, F_WAREHOUSE_ID, F_TIME, F_STATE, F_IMG, F_INTRO, F_RETAIL_PRICE, F_SUPPLY_PRICE, F_PRICE, F_GONGYE_PRICE, F_BUYING_PRICE, F_BALANCE_ID, F_COMPANY_ID, F_DRUG_ONLY_ID
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID where a.F_STATE in(0,3)
and a.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and b.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCityName} ,"%")
and a.F_TIME like CONCAT("",#{time} ,"%")

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_SPECIFICATION, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_BATCH_NUMBER, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE, a.F_NUMBER, a.F_NUMBER_BAK, a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID, a.F_TIME, a.F_STATE, a.F_IMG, a.F_INTRO, a.F_PRICE, a.F_GONGYE_PRICE, a.F_BUYING_PRICE, a.F_RETAIL_PRICE, a.F_SUPPLY_PRICE, a.F_COMPANY_ID, b.F_NAME F_WAREHOUSE_NAME, c.F_NAME F_COMPANY_NAME FROM t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID left join t_company c on a.F_COMPANY_ID=c.F_ID where a.F_STATE in(0,3)
and a.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and b.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCityName} ,"%")
and a.F_TIME like CONCAT("",#{time} ,"%")
order by a.F_ID desc LIMIT #{page}, #{rows}

select count(1) from t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID where a.F_STATE in(0,2,3)
and a.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and b.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCityName} ,"%")
and a.F_TIME >= #{beginTime} AND a.F_TIME <= #{endTime}

SELECT count(1) FROM t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_user_drug c ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=c.F_DRUG_ID WHERE c.F_USER_ID=#{userId} and a.F_NUMBER!=0 and a.F_STATE in(0,3)
and a.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and b.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCityName} ,"%")

SELECT count(1) FROM t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_user_drug c ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=c.F_DRUG_ID LEFT JOIN t_drug_only d ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=d.F_ID WHERE c.F_USER_ID=#{userId} and a.F_NUMBER!=0 and a.F_STATE in(0,3)
AND a.F_COMPANY_ID in(${fCompanyIds})
AND d.F_DRUG_PRINTER_ID in(${fDrugPrinterIds})
and a.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and b.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCityName} ,"%")
and a.F_ID not in
#{item}
and a.F_TIME like CONCAT("",#{time} ,"%")

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_SPECIFICATION, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_BATCH_NUMBER, a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE, a.F_NUMBER, a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.F_TIME, a.F_STATE, a.F_IMG, a.F_INTRO, a.F_PRICE, a.F_GONGYE_PRICE, a.F_BUYING_PRICE, b.F_NAME F_WAREHOUSE_NAME FROM t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_user_drug c ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=c.F_DRUG_ID WHERE c.F_USER_ID=#{userId} and a.F_NUMBER!=0 and a.F_STATE in(0,3)
and a.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and b.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCityName} ,"%")
ORDER BY a.F_NAME, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE ASC LIMIT #{page}, #{rows}

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_SPECIFICATION, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_BATCH_NUMBER, a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE, a.F_NUMBER, a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.F_TIME, a.F_STATE, a.F_IMG, a.F_INTRO, a.F_PRICE, a.F_GONGYE_PRICE, a.F_BUYING_PRICE, b.F_NAME F_WAREHOUSE_NAME, d.F_DRUG_PRINTER_ID, d.F_DQ_TC, d.F_XQ_TC FROM t_drug a JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID JOIN t_user_drug c ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=c.F_DRUG_ID JOIN t_drug_only d ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=d.F_ID
WHERE c.F_USER_ID=#{userId} and a.F_NUMBER!=0 and a.F_STATE in(0,3) AND d.F_STATE=0 AND b.F_STATE=0
AND a.F_COMPANY_ID in(${fCompanyIds})
AND d.F_DRUG_PRINTER_ID in(${fDrugPrinterIds})
and a.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fName} ,"%")
and b.F_NAME like CONCAT("%",#{fCityName} ,"%")
and a.F_ID not in
#{item}
and a.F_TIME like CONCAT("",#{time} ,"%")
ORDER BY a.F_NAME, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE ASC, a.F_NUMBER asc LIMIT #{page}, #{rows}

SELECT F_ID,F_NUMBER FROM t_drug where f_state in(0,3)
and F_TIME like CONCAT("",#{time} ,"%")

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_SPECIFICATION, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_BATCH_NUMBER, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE, a.F_NUMBER, a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.F_TIME, a.F_STATE, a.F_IMG, a.F_INTRO, a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID, a.F_PRICE, a.F_GONGYE_PRICE, b.F_NAME F_WAREHOUSE_NAME FROM t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID where a.F_STATE=0

SELECT a.F_ID, a.F_NAME, a.F_SPECIFICATION, a.F_ADDRESS, a.F_BATCH_NUMBER, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE, a.F_NUMBER, a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID, a.F_TIME, a.F_STATE, a.F_IMG, a.F_INTRO, a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID, a.F_PRICE, a.F_GONGYE_PRICE FROM t_drug a LEFT JOIN t_warehouse b ON a.F_WAREHOUSE_ID=b.F_ID LEFT JOIN t_user_drug c ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=c.F_DRUG_ID LEFT JOIN t_drug_only d ON a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=d.F_ID where a.F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=#{fDrugOnlyId} and a.F_NUMBER!=0 and a.F_STATE in(0,3)
and a.F_ID not in
#{item}
AND a.F_COMPANY_ID in(${fCompanyIds})
AND d.F_DRUG_PRINTER_ID in(${fDrugPrinterIds})
and a.F_TIME like CONCAT("",#{time} ,"%")
ORDER BY a.F_NAME, a.F_EXPIRY_DATE ASC, a.F_NUMBER asc
SELECT F_DRUG_ID FROM t_user_drug where F_USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_drug
F_IMG,
F_ADDRESS,
F_NAME,
F_STATE,
F_TIME,
F_SPECIFICATION,
F_BATCH_NUMBER,
F_EXPIRY_DATE,
F_NUMBER,
F_NUMBER_BAK,
F_INTRO,
F_WAREHOUSE_ID,
F_PRICE,
F_GONGYE_PRICE,
F_SUPPLY_PRICE,
F_RETAIL_PRICE,
F_DRUG_ONLY_ID,
F_BUYING_PRICE,
F_BALANCE_ID,
F_COMPANY_ID,
#{fImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fExpiryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fNumberBak,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fWareHouseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{fGongyePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{fSupplyPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{fRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{fDrugOnlyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fBuyingPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{fBalanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_drug
F_ADDRESS = #{fAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_NAME = #{fName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_STATE = #{fState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SPECIFICATION = #{fSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_BATCH_NUMBER = #{fBatchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_EXPIRY_DATE = #{fExpiryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_NUMBER = #{fNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_NUMBER_BAK = #{fNumberBak,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_INTRO = #{fIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_WAREHOUSE_ID = #{fWareHouseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_PRICE = #{fPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_GONGYE_PRICE = #{fGongyePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_IMG = #{fImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
F_SUPPLY_PRICE = #{fSupplyPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_RETAIL_PRICE = #{fRetailPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_DRUG_ONLY_ID = #{fDrugOnlyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
F_BUYING_PRICE = #{fBuyingPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
F_COMPANY_ID = #{fCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE F_ID = #{fId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_user_drugonly_price where F_USER_ID=#{userId} and F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=#{drugOnlyId}
mapper.select: select F_SUPPLY_PRICE, F_RETAIL_PRICE from t_user_drugonly_price where F_USER_ID=#{userId} and F_DRUG_ONLY_ID=#{drugOnlyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_drug SET F_NUMBER=F_NUMBER+#{fNumber} WHERE F_ID=#{fDrugId}
UPDATE t_drug set F_WAREHOUSE_ID = null where F_WAREHOUSE_ID = #{fId}
mapper.select:
select
from t_drug where F_TIME like concat('', #{yyyyMM}, '%') and F_NUMBER>0 and F_STATE in(0,3)
